Comprehensive understanding of digital marketing concepts, including social media, email, and SEO. Builds knowledge for digital campaign management. Demonstrates proficiency in real-world marketing scenarios.



Career Essentials in Generative AI â€“ Microsoft & LinkedIn

Introduction to AI fundamentals and generative models. Covers practical applications in business workflows. Focused on understanding AI-driven content creation and analytics.



Artificial Intelligence â€“ LinkedIn Learning

Explores AI techniques and machine learning algorithms. Provides hands-on experience with AI tools. Prepares learners for analytical problem-solving using AI technologies.



Generative AI â€“ LinkedIn Learning

Focuses on generative AI models for content creation. Explains key concepts like GPT architectures. Offers practical exercises in generating text and data-driven solutions.



PowerPoint Data Visualization â€“ LinkedIn Learning

Enhances skills in visual storytelling and effective data presentation. Covers charts, dashboards, and advanced visualization techniques. Prepares learners for professional reporting and presentations.



Time Series & Forecasting with GPT-4 â€“ LinkedIn Learning

Focuses on time series analysis and forecasting techniques using GPT-4. Covers prediction models, trend analysis, and practical applications in business analytics. Provides hands-on experience in predictive analytics.

title: Projects
text:
Netflix Advertising Campaign Analysis


This project involved a strategic analysis of a Netflix advertising campaign, utilizing key frameworks to evaluate its effectiveness. I conducted a SWOT analysis to understand the campaignâ€™s internal and external factors, and a PESTLE analysis to assess the broader market environment. I also applied elements of the McKinsey 7S Framework to evaluate the internal alignment of the campaignâ€™s strategy. This comprehensive assessment provided data-driven insights and strategic recommendations for future marketing initiatives.




Market Simulation Project


In this project, I managed a digital computer manufacturing company within a market simulation. My role involved making strategic decisions across various business functionsâ€”from production and marketing to finance and salesâ€”to compete against rival firms in multiple regional markets. I analyzed market data, adjusted pricing and product features, and optimized resource allocation to drive profitability and secure a competitive advantage. This experience provided practical, hands-on knowledge in small business management, highlighting the direct impact of strategic choices on a companyâ€™s performance.




Machine Learning Algorithms Project


In this project, I utilized machine learning algorithms to analyze a dataset and build a predictive model. I began by performing data preprocessing to clean and prepare the data for analysis. I then selected and implemented appropriate machine learning models, such as linear regression or classification algorithms, to solve a specific problem, such as predicting customer churn or forecasting sales. I evaluated the performance of each model using key metrics and tuned the parameters to optimize their accuracy. The project demonstrates my ability to apply machine learning principles from data preparation to model deployment and evaluation.




SQL Database Project


For this project, I designed, built, and queried a SQL database to analyze political donations in Great Britain and Northern Ireland. I began by creating the database schema, defining tables, and establishing relationships to ensure data integrity. After loading the dataset, I used Structured Query Language (SQL) to perform complex queries to identify key trends, such as donation patterns over time, the distribution of funds by political party, and contributions from various regions. The final deliverable was a comprehensive report and a set of query results that provided data-driven insights to inform strategic decisions. This project showcases my proficiency in database management and my ability to translate raw data into actionable business intelligence.
